reviews.text: We take breakfast , was very big portion. Cofe unlimited. We really liked this place ğŸ˜Š good price
Helpful and efficient service.Very decent food at reasonable cost for New York

This place is the spot !! Every time We visit NYC , We go to this classic American diner , good food, ok prices, nice vibe and the service is always excellent,  specially when our server is the Mexican guy name Antonio, he is always patient, fast, check on us with more coffee or anything we need, He never rush us to order or to pay, my husband says he is the nicest person there, we have being there when is super busy and he is always polite making us feel appreciated, sometimes is the service that makes you come back.
Pancake eccezionali

The standout feature of this restaurant was the service, which was both fast and incredibly accurate. Our orders were taken and delivered with impressive speed, making it a great stop if you're in a rush. Unfortunately, the food didn't quite match the pace. Everything we tried was simply 'just okay'â€”nothing inherently bad, but certainly nothing memorable or exciting enough to warrant a second visit.
The food was amazing and the service was absolutely great.  So far have eaten here twice this week
Porzioni abbondanti, prezzi nella media, servizio un po' scocciato.

My wife and I are having a 3 night â€œWhistle Stopâ€ tour of NYC. We are staying at the Yotel a few blocks away from the Westway and have had breakfast here on both mornings so far and canâ€™t express how great this place is for food, staff friendliest and atmosphere of this place. Especially the service today by Imelda. When we return to New York again, we will definitely be returning here ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š

I don't write reviews but the horrible service we experienced last time We were there was really bad (sunday October 19th 2025), first the waiter was rushing us to order, because we were not ready to order He started speaking in spanish to us, honestly he seems to be making fun of us or at leats that is how we felt. He just delivered the food to the table and never, never come back to check on us, no one time, We wanted more coffee but he never offer us more,  the food was good, is always good every single time we go there, but the service is very important also; we asked the check to 4 different people ( I am not even kidding), I do not know if this guy was the owner or the owner's son, or the manager, but his attitude was the worse, making us feel like we were bothering, We like to eat in this dinner  when we go to the city but I will not stay and eat in this place  if the server is this guy again, I rather to go somewhere else. He told us his name is.''Pancho" , but the check said that his name is ALVARO.

We came here on our last day for breakfast and wish we had come sooner. To put it in perspective we needed some home comforts. New York is a fast paced city where people don't normally have time for tourists - it can feel unfriendly at times. But coming here was like coming home. The warm greeting from Jeff at the door, was akin to putting cold hands near a warm fire - instantly soothing and pleasant. The service came with a smile, with friendliness, we didn't feel rushed, nothing was too much. Coffee was refilled, food was delicious and plentiful amd prices very reasonable. This will be my first stop rather than my last stop next time I visit NYC. We had pancakes with banana, Nutella, bacon and syrup which were delicious. We were especially impressed by the fluffiness of the pancakes. We'll be dreaming of this breakfast until next time!
A beautiful diner experience just off Times Square. â€More coffee?â€œ Yes, please!

Brits! If you haven't been here.. defo give it a go even if u que.. it goes down quick.. food lovely coffee never stops coming.. me and my 2 teenagers.. loved it for the start of the day. Its a must amd affordable  for those on a budget or not.
Had a great dinner after seeing a show
All I can say is that the French toast with eggs, bacon, and maple syrup was exactly what I needed after drinking all day the day before.

A classic american diner. Very good service, very good food and a very nice,  classic us dinner Ambiente.
A great Menue to Choose from.
Try the french Toast  "Red, White, Blue"! Fresh Tasty  fruits  on a french  Toast... wonderfull.â¤ï¸ even the maple  Sirup you get is warmed  up a bit..Just perfect.
So go there, order, have fun and enjoy.

Nice little diner with quick and friendly service. Save money when you pay with cash. Diverse menu including a healthier section breakfast. I ordered an egg white omelet called The Brutus which came with broccoli, mushrooms salad and whole grain toast. It was just what I wanted. They also have daily specials. Look for the placards on the table. Enjoy :-)
Super dÃ®ner ouvert tout les jours serveur super attentionnÃ© et la cuisine trÃ¨s gÃ©nÃ©reuse et bonne surtout les milkshakes chocolat hum!!!
Bence mÃ¼kemmel bir yer yemekler ve personel inanÄ±lmaz iyi ve ilgi tam ideal.

Iâ€™m so happy I got to visit this iconic place. I canâ€™t remember its name, but the waiter was amazing and the menu was something I could get lost in. What more can you say? As a Seinfeld fan, you should definitely come here and order the pancakes and you wonâ€™t need to eat anything else for the rest of the day!
Decent food and decent price, especially for midtown Manhattan.
The food was delivered very quickly nicely prepared a large portion is and very delicious

Maden smagte godt.

Restauranten er hyggelig.

De har et meget stort menukort,  det kan virke lidt uoverskueligt.
Great food, great atmosphere, and great service. Weâ€™ll definitely be coming back.
Had a great breakfast there. Antonio helped us really well. The food, the ambience of classic American Diner, really brings happiness. Will love to come back anytime we go to NYC again.
A great and cozy place in the heart of NYC! Will visit again!
unbelievable, I loved the food and the service.
The food was good but the server said that the medium rare burger was bloody?
Food was good and warm

One of the better and semi-affordable places in the area. The food was pretty good, and the staff was awesome. They are constantly doing rounds checking in on us. They did get pretty crowded but even then we were sat fairly quick. All the food that came to our table looked delicious. Would recommend checking it out!

Typical american diner. You can find meals for breakfast, lunch or diner. We ordered a sandwich and it was absolutely amazing. Next time I would love to try something from breakfast menu. Service was fast.
Schneller, aufmerksamer Service. Gute Auswahl und faire Preise.
Very nice, very clean, very good service.  Typical diner experience. Menu had lots of options including breakfast items served at lunch time.
Quick and friendly service. Food tasty and hot. I visited twice during my trip and enjoyed both of my visits.

This place understands and serves the local community. Westway Diner combines positional advantage with good service. Waiters delivered perfect service with inventive meals. I formed bonds with the people here, who are all excellent and uncommonly kind. The employees show remarkable attention.

Oh my goodness what a fantastic diner/restaurant! Itâ€™s a hidden gem on 9th street. The server, Valentine, was everything a server should be! He was professional, friendly, courteous, and knowledgeable!
We ordered the chicken Marsala which was served with spaghetti. The chicken was tender, the sauce perfect and the spaghetti a la dente. It was served with a salad and bread basket. I also ordered chicken noodle soup that tasted homemade. We usually donâ€™t order desserts but the dessert counter looked incredible. We ordered German chocolate cake with ice cream. Delicious is an understatement! It was perfection!!
Every staff member was friendly, welcoming and respectful. My biggest complaint?
I was in New York for five days and on my last day we found this incredible diner. I can honestly say I canâ€™t believe there are not lines down the street waiting for this place.
The restaurant was CLEAN, the rest rooms were Immaculately taken care of. Truly I am impressed!
Please donâ€™t skip this restaurant!!
Nice spot but had nicer in NYC. Staff are really lovely and always attentive
Yiyecekler Ã§ok lezzetliydi, Ã§alÄ±ÅŸanlar oldukÃ§a gÃ¼leryÃ¼zlÃ¼ ve ilgiliydi.
We visited from the UK and found this place yesterday went back today really nice food and the waiter service was the best since we have been here.
Westway catered National Pancake Day at Avalon Clinton, and it was a huge success! Not only were the pancakes delicious, but the team also did a fantastic job setting up! thank you!
Ä±t has good rates but Ä±ts not good
Service was great food was meh. Ok. Prob wouldn't go again
Nice place. Good service

Stopped in for dinner last night and liked it so much we stopped in for breakfast today. Menu has many options for breakfast and dinner. I wish I had taken pictures.
My walnut pancakes with bananas were amazing.

Ate here three times as it was local. A bright, clean diner with good spacious seating and reasonable prices. Service was attentive and all the different meals we had were tasty, well cooked and arrived hot.
Our 'go to' place for breakfast when visiting NYC, great freshly prepared food and very enthusiastic staff who really do look after you.
Westway Diner is proof that breakfast has no curfew. Who says you canâ€™t have French toast for lunch! Cozy vibes and that NYC classic diner energy

Westway Diner (614 9th Ave, New York, NY) was a solid stop for lunch. The food was about a 6/10 â€” decent and filling, though nothing that really stood out. Service was good, with attentive staff, and the diner itself was clean and comfortable. We went around lunchtime and it wasnâ€™t terribly busy, which made for a relaxed visit.

Overall, a dependable choice if youâ€™re in the area.
Really good food.
Nice place
Fast service, good food. Away from touristic places.

Wir waren hier zum FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck und absolut begeistert! Das Essen war super lecker, authentisch und typisch amerikanisch â€“ genau so, wie man es sich in New York wÃ¼nscht. Die AtmosphÃ¤re ist toll und rundet das Erlebnis perfekt ab. Alles in allem ein groÃŸartiger Start in den Tag â€“ absolut empfehlenswert!

Really excellent place for breakfast. The food was so much better than it looked. It looked dull, very little colour, but it tasted great! Staff were extremely attentive and polite. Fast service! Would absolutely come back!

Great American diner with friendly staff and efficient service.

Staff are extremely attentive. The coffee is always hot and they'll make sure you are always topped up on the unlimited refills for coffee or ice water.

We ordered the french toast with maple syrup and Pancakes, Bacon, Whipped Butter and Maple Syrup. Food arrived hot and fresh. The American style pancakes were soft and not stodgy at all. The bacon was crispy and the syrup was warm and gooey.

The french toast was well cooked with a light dosing of icing sugar and just the right level of cinnamon. Paired with the maple syrup this was the perfect breakfast treat.

This diner proved popular as it was busy at 9:30am with a cozy atmosphere. Recommend coming here if you want to experience a hearty American breakfast with warm and friendly service.

The portions are huge and the food tastes way better than it looks; definitely delicious comfort diner food. The staff were super friendly and very attentive, and the service was impressively fast! Prices are affordable and the restaurant is just about a 7-10 minute walk from Times Square. Highly recommend if you want a hearty, classic breakfast/dinner meal in the city!

Historic NY diner with excellent service and staff. We were so excited to see that the diner where Seinfeld wrote Seinfeld was right by our hotel.

We came in as a group for breakfast and were seated right away. The host was great and told us the history of the place. Esmeralda was our waitress and was so fast, thorough, and accurate. We had our food quick.

The atmosphere is fabulous. A real time-capsule of everything a diner should be and used to be.

Our food was basic diner fare. Nothing too fancy but good. Our omelet was a bit overcooked but I'm not complaining cause I had a good experience.

We visited Westway Diner every morning during our trip to New York City, thatâ€™s how much we loved it! It quickly became our favorite breakfast spot in the city.

The food was consistently delicious, fresh, and satisfying, with a great variety of classic diner options. Whether it was eggs, pancakes, or a hearty breakfast sandwich, everything hit the spot.

The staff were friendly and efficient, making us feel right at home each morning. The service was fast, and the atmosphere was that perfect blend of relaxed and bustling, exactly what you want from a classic New York diner.

Canâ€™t recommend this place enough. Westway Diner is a must if youâ€™re in NYC and want a reliable, tasty, and welcoming start to your day. 10/10!

I was really impressed by the food here! My mom wanted to go here for its connection to Seinfeld. Thankfully I actually am old enough to appreciate that, so that aspect in itself was cool. The food being great was a huge bonus. The menu was large and I really enjoyed the fettuccini Alfredo I got. My sister got mac and cheese and it honestly looked really good, like it was homemade and not Kraft or something. We also all got dessert, which was also delicious. I got a mousse cake, which was decadent, my sister got ice cream, and my mom got tiramisu which she said was absolutely delicious. Iâ€™d definitely go back again if I was in the area. Iâ€™d like to try the breakfast in the future.

Pretty standard NYC diner. I came here because the line was really long on a Saturday (which moved quickly), but they were most likely tourists. The Hellâ€™s Kitchen wrap was very dry and plasticy, but the waffle was good enough.

Tipico diner americano aperto quasi 24 ore che serve ogni tipologia di pasto.
Credo di aver mangiato tra i piÃ¹ buoni pancake newyorkesi.
Ottima anche la qualitÃ -prezzo, soprattutto rispetto ad altri nomi sopravvalutati (es. Bubby's).
Enormi, soffici, buoni!

Westway Diner is THE BEST diner! We tried another diner (Skylight) and fully regret going there.

If you want a warm, cozy diner with good food, Westway diner is the place to be. Everybody from the front to waiters everyone made us feel super comfortable. We had corned beef Reuben, spaghetti with meat sauce, beef Philly cheese steak wrap, lamb philly sandwich, french toast, eggs Benedict and mac and cheese and all of them were sooooo good. We also had their cheesecake and it is superb!!!!

My favorite is the spaghetti meat sauce and beef Philly and cheesecake.

Our kid loved it there, never fussed as he was just so comfy. He enjoyed all the food too. We will definitely come back here again when we visit NYC next time.

We had an awesome family breakfast at this cozy spot. The moment we stepped in, they served us water, which was a really nice touch. The food was super tasty, and the vibe was just right. Plus, the waiters speak Spanish, making the whole experience extra welcoming. Our waiter was incredibly friendly and attentive, making our visit even better. Overall, it was a fantastic morning, and we'd highly recommend this place!

Love the vibes here. Definitely stop by here again when I'm in NeyYork. Only giving it a 4 as since the service was fast and on point, the western omelette & potatoes I had was a bit overcooked. As you see the chicken is waffles in the background my gf had was great ğŸ‘€ highly recommend stopping here for some good ol dinner food ğŸ˜‡

Great dinner with a wide variety of breakfast foods. You can have a traditional lox and bagel plate or Benedicts or pancakes. All the food was delicious and the staff was friendly.

We were lucky and arrived and were seated right away but there was a big line right after us.

We had lox and bagel which was great...capers, cream cheese, onion and salmon with a fresh roasted bagel.cPancakes and sausage and more "American" breakfast food. The pork sausage was better than the turkey. Fluffy and perfectly prepared eggs.

The menu is huge so options for everyone.
GREAT diner!! Fabulous food, fast & courteous service,  even when it's busy. Highly recommend!!

Es tal cual esperas de una experiencia en un dinner americano, sentarse en gabinetes, muy buena atenciÃ³n del personal, porciones abundantes, muy buen sabor, los hotcakes son deliciosos, precios adecuados para la zona, mucho personal habla espaÃ±ol, por si eso es un tema. En nuestra visita fuimos 2 veces, por lo que lo recomendamos totalmente.

Un petit dinner amÃ©ricain trÃ¨s sympa oÃ¹ les portions sont gÃ©nÃ©reuses (du moins pour les pancakes) et oÃ¹ le choix est variÃ©.
En revanche, le prix grimpe vite lorsquâ€™on souhaite ajouter de la garniture (notamment dans les bangels ou les pancakes).
Les serveurs sont trÃ¨s gentils, cafÃ© et eau fraÃ®che (non nÃ©gligeable en Ã©tÃ©) servis sans quâ€™on le demande et Ã  volontÃ©.
En revanche, je pense que ce restaurant est habituÃ© aux touristes et tente dâ€™en tirer profit. On a tentÃ© Â«Â par erreur malencontreuseÂ Â» de me facturer deux fois le mÃªme plat. Faites donc attention Ã  vos reÃ§us avant de payer !

Speaking from the I, my experience and opinions.  I love eating at Diners, and Westway did not disappoint.Â  It was very clean, the service was decent, the staff was polite, and the food was delicious.Â  They have a very big menue with lots of varieties.
We were seated, given water and food order taken within 10 mins. The food arrived quickly, with smiles and very hot. The prices are reasonable.Â  My partner ordered something that I disliked.Â  She asked me to try it, and I did.Â  I can honestly say it was the best sautÃ©ed mushrooms with garlic that I ever had.Â  I ate most of them off her plate.Â  DELICIOUS!!Â Â   I would absolutely eat here again.

Wow what a find. Great American diner serving great and very reasonably priced food. Great service and friendly staff. Usual free coffee/soft drink refill..
Extremely fairly priced for New York. A must vist. We did quite a lot !! Everything we had was cooked to order and was delicious.
Oh and it can be very busy here so you might have to wait to be seated
We cannot recommend  Westway diner highly enough.
Spacious diner in the heart of NYC. Amazing breakfast food. No nonsense and quick service. Will definitely return!

I thought the staff was super nice qnd the food was realsly good. Its a bit on the pricer side, but I am from GA, so, I know New York is just pricey. I did not like thst they could not do sweet tea, but I notice that is also just like a New York thing. They were crazy busy and there was a bit of a wait. The waiters more like they are on skates and its really noisy in there, but overall good. I will not take away from how nice they were, which I didn't see a lot of in New York.

Whilst visiting New York for the week we came to westway diner regular!

The service is excellent. It is fast and efficient and the staff are so friendly!

The food is just delicious! It is so tasty and filling and the portions are amazing.

The prices are very fair too for the portions you do get!

We would definitely recommend visiting here if you come to NYC!

Westway Diner absolutely knocked it out of the park! Our Lamb Hogue was a revelation â€“ the lamb was tender and flavorful, perfectly complemented by fresh toppings and a delicious, crusty roll. It was truly a standout sandwich and one of the best I've had in a long time.
Beyond the incredible food, the service was exceptional. Our server was attentive, friendly, and made us feel genuinely welcome. They were prompt with our order and checked in on us just the right amount without being intrusive. Looking at other five-star reviews, it's clear that this level of quality and service is consistent. Many reviewers praise the friendly staff, the generous portions, and the consistently delicious food across the menu. Westway Diner offers that classic diner feel with a commitment to excellence that shines through in every aspect. It's a true neighborhood gem and a must-visit for anyone looking for a fantastic meal and a welcoming atmosphere. Five stars without hesitation!

Very happy with the food and service here. The food is fresh and tasty and I really appreciated their hospitality. They let us stay slightly after they closed the diner to finish the food. Itâ€™s usually really busy here, you might need to queue outside, but itâ€™s worth it! We didnâ€™t have to wait more than 10-15 minutes. Very reasonable prices for the amount of food you get. The pancakes are massive (about 20-30cm wide and very, very fluffy, they melt in your mouth. Besides of having great food, this is the birthplace of Seinfeld!

Westway Diner in NYC delivers a classic American breakfast experience, and the Corned Beef Hash & Eggs is a must-try. The crispy corned beef paired with perfectly cooked eggs creates a hearty, satisfying meal that captures the essence of a traditional diner breakfast. It's a true comfort food dish and a great way to start the day!

This place makes the traditional diner food you expect, with the midtown experience you want. It was nice stopping in for dinner. Seated immediately on a Sunday evening. Staff was professional and friendly. The food was fantastic. They had a lot of menu options and handled any food accommodations really well.
Another guest I saw, with several young children were taken care of well and the kids seemed overall really happy. It's a nice comfortable place that isn't overpriced. The place in whole was pretty clean as were their bathrooms. I'd come back here a few times.

Visited Westway Diner at the end of a three night trip to new york and it was the perfect way to finish off the trip. We spent our time visiting highly recommended sights and food spots (Katzâ€˜s, TimeOut Market, ShakeShack Madison Square Park), which was a nice experience. However, Westway had unbeatable service from really friendly and welcoming staff that went out of their way to ensure youâ€˜re comfortable. Everyone will find something to their liking on the menu, and everything was really well priced. In a place as wild and busy as New York, come here if you ever need a short break from it all that youâ€˜ll always enjoy.
